name: High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and Privileges) (Amendment) Order, 2009
tagline: Amendment of the High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and Privileges) Order, 1997
content:
HIGH COURT JUDGES (LEAVE, PENSION AND PRIVILEGES) (AMENDMENT)ORDER, 2009
Last Updated: 2009­12­01
Contents
PREAMBLE.
.
1 SHORT TITLE AND COMMENCEMENT
2 AMENDMENT OF PARAGRAPH 22, PO NO 3 OF 1997
 
PRESIDENT'S ORDER 4 OF 2009
An
Order
further to amend the High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and Privileges) Order, 1997
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the High Court Judges (Leave, Pension and
Privileges) Order, 1997, (P.O. No.3 of 1997), for the purposes hereinafter appearing;
NOW, THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers conferred by the Fifth Schedule to the
Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President is pleased to make the following
Order:­
1. Short title and commencement.­(1) This Order may be called the High Court Judges (Leave,
Pension and Privileges) (Amendment) Order, 2009.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment of paragraph 22, P.O. No. 3 of 1997. In the said Order, in paragraph 22, for the
word "four" the word "five" shall be substituted.
 
_________
